website_summaries.verdict: It's like a basket that easily attaches to the front of your bike and can be detached so you can carry it like a purse.
pros: or less), that prefer to go everywhere with their owners
Has a comfy inner-material that helps calm the dog
Easy to add or remove from your bike's handlebar
cons: Features an inner strap to secure the dog that can snap if you aren't careful

customer_reviews.title: The inside is nice and soft though but has no harness so the ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my hybrid bike but once I put my little one in the basket, it is hard to close the top around the neck area. If you don't put a knot on the closure, it starts to loosen up but once you knot it, it bothers my dog as it's uncomfortable on his neck. It needs to be made with a softer material. Had to return it! The inside is nice and soft though but has no harness so the dog can jump out of it easily. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Abcd

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Basket is a tight fit for our medium size poodle mix. He’s a bit long, but enjoys the ride and wind blowing in his face. Attaching to the bike was simple and straightforward. No additional brackets to mount. The bag has a long strap to place over the shoulder. The pad in the bottom of the basket is comfortable and supportive. Basket not overly bulky to cause any problems while riding.
customer_reviews.author: H1Hapa

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your dog is man enough (ours is a wimp)
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because I wish there was a way to strap the bottom to the bike as well as the top. Nonetheless, it feels very sturdy. Our dog is actually scared to ride in it, so make sure you consider your dogs courage before purchasing. He tries to jump out sometimes which is annoying, but that’s a dog issue, not a basket issue!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: This basket works great and my pup loves it and is very secure in it.
customer_reviews.author: Star Heaven

customer_reviews.title: It appears sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this to work because it looked a bit big. But my daughter loves it and takes our dog everywhere on her bike using it. She has even put her bunny in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Bicycle/Pet Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This a perfect and convenient little carrier for small pups! The inner pad is removable for easy cleaning, and all the pockets are great for storing keys, treats, cash, whatever you might need to tote along. It’s super easy to use, and to take on and off your bike whenever you may want to. Definitely recommend it for small pet owners!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: This dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Garbo, loves this carrier. We rode up and down the beach together. It stays put on the bike and it is comfortable for her. Easy to remove and reinstall.
customer_reviews.author: michelle springer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pet basket!
customer_reviews.text: Basket was super easy to fit into my bike and carry our dog around, he loved it! Its super durable material and light enough to fold and carry with you if needed. Stable and secure and beautiful colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Waxtein M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Carrier. My Dog Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is awesome for going on bike rides, It was easy to mount and my dog was super comfy the whole time. It also works amazing for traveling and bringing you loved one along. The padded strap is very comfortable on the shoulder and its easy to carry. When its folds its super easy to store since it does not take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: PRO digitizing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but my the strap to hold the dog I’m broke on 2nd time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Holt

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, but I thing I will need bigger one. However my dog got use to it after few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: There is no secure leash for the dog inside it
customer_reviews.text: The picture false advertised that theres leash to secure the dog but there isn't so the dog can easily jump out if it wants to. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t see the Velcro insert area but once I figured it out the carrier is quite steady. My chihuahua was a bit nervous at first but then got used to it. I was nervous she was going to jump out when a dog passed by but she did fine. I wish the top closed a bit more but overall pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The security top Drawstring doesn't work properly. My dog is just 9 pounds and doesn't feel too safe. He managed to jump out.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana Fitzer

customer_reviews.title: Most important is that it’s very safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Yorkie so I can take her with me on my bike rides and I love it and so does she. She is very safe in her new basket. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Basket sat way too close to the gears not allowing room for me to brake on the handlebars. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Size is important
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag very much. It is good for spending a great time with your pet. But please, mind the size. It is smaller than I thought. My dog is little, but the bag is a little bit small for him. The bag is only for very little dogs or cats.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Sorokina

customer_reviews.title: Our puppy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! We are able to take our puppy with us, wherever we go. It is so comfortable, easy to assemble and clean. And our puppy loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Feels safe and fits my 14 pound dog nicely. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Otoole

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Cannot begin to express how much we love this! We used to keep our dog in a basket in the back of one of our bikes, but this is so much more secure and comfortable for him. And no chance of falling out! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you’re bringing your dog out on the bike with you.
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdy and my daughter’s dog didn’t try to jump out and seemed to enjoy being in the basket.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen e mceachern

product_meta.title: Pet Carrier Bicycle Basket Bag for Dogs & Cats | Adjustable Size,Comfy & Padded Shoulder Strap, Secure Top Drawstring, Removable Inner Pad & Side Pockets | Travel with Your Pet Safely
product_meta.description:
Take Your Pet With You –Let It See The Outside World! 

With A Pet Lovingly Bike Basket Carrier! 

Do you ... 



... love riding your bike? 



... want to have your cute little puppy with you everywhere you go? 



... worry about its safety when it’s all alone? 



... hate all those swingy and cheaply made pet carriers? 



... need a multifunctional bike dogbasket? 



If you are nodding, then this pet carrier is the way to go. Treat your fluffy friend with only the best. Let it explore the whole world while you are riding your bike. Have some fun together and keep fit at the same time! 

It’s a win-win. 



Brings Comfort, Safety & Ease Together!

Using a combination of comfy inner lining, adjustable buckles and ergonomic shoulder strap, this pet carrier basket is an absolute must have addition to your pet’s arsenal. 



Have your pet sit, lie or stand inside the basket and off you go. Adjust the drawstring on top to regulate accessibility and breathability. 



Attach the safety strap to your bike as firmly as possible. This pet carrier will never compromise the safety of your buddy! 



Ideal for all small size pets, like dogs, cats, piglets, ferrets and others. Suitable for pets up to 10 lbs (4.5 kilos). 

Perfect for Chihuahuas and Shih Tzus, Yorkies, Boston Terriers and your pet as well.



Why Go For A Pet Lovingly Bike Pet Carrier Bag?

Because it... 

· works as a bike basket or a shoulder bag.


· has many pockets. For snacks, toys, keys and others. 


· comes with a padded shoulder strap. 


· is comfy, stylish and modern. 


· inner pad can be washed in the machine. 


· folds and packs effortlessly. 


· keeps your pet close by no matter what. 


What are you waiting for? 



Scroll Up &Click Add To Cart Now!
feature_bullets: TAKE YOUR DOG WITH YOU EVERYWHERE YOU GO: Do you love your pet and want to take it with you simply everywhere? No more worries! Pet Lovingly proudly presents the ultimate pet carrier bag basket. Riding your bike? Commuting to work? Running errands? Your four legged friend will always be with you.

SAFE & SECURE PET CARRIER: Keep your pet safe and sound while you exercise or simply ride your bike. With our secure pet bag attached on your bike. The top drawstring ensures that your pet is safe no matter what. The inner pad is comfy and super cozy. Your pet can even take a nap. Keep the top open for extra breathability. Suitable for pets up to 10 lbs (4.5 kilos).

POCKETS FOR DOG ESSENTIALS: Hold a Pet Lovingly carrier bag in your hands and explore its modern and highly functional design. It has mesh and pockets to make your trips easier. Carry dog treats, toys, your cell phone, snacks, training kits and waste bags. This pet basket is fully adjustable so as to ensure a comfy yet safe fit. "It have full Money Back and Quality Guarantee"

1 PET CARRIER SO MANY USES: This clever bike pet carrier is designed to satisfy even the most demanding dog owners. Use it as a front pet basket on your bike or as a shoulder carrying bag. Its soft and padded shoulder strap facilitates use to the fullest without every tiring your shoulder or back! Try it today and see for yourself.

HASSLE FREE WASHING: If you love exploring the outdoors with your pet like we do, then you know how dirty a pet can get. Save your precious time with our machine washable inner pad. When it’s cleaning time, simply toss it in the washing machine and let it do the rest. It’s compact and lightweight. Fold and pack in secs.
